## CodeBuilderOptions.path property

Path adapter for path operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
path: PathAdapter;
```

## Remarks

For Node.js environments, use `NodePathAdapter` from `@boba-cli/machine/node`<!-- -->. For browser environments, provide a custom implementation.
